Name: Loco Shortline Operations
About the game: Check out our discord for updates and bug reporting. Build your way across the map and earn your riches using Reliable Fully Pysically simulated vehicles (no just following a perfect line and playing a wobble animation here) How you build your track makes the difference! Steam and Diesel trains, Trucks, Boats, Cranes and Forklifts. Are all avaliable to help deliver a veriety of goods to earn that sweet dolla. Begin by buying vehicles and build track between supply points to deliver goods and earn your way though multiple powerfull vehicles. Carry many cargo types with actual weight and physics effecting how vehicles perform. Dont forget to fill up with diesel/ water or find yourself stranded needing a delivery of fuel. Join your friends through steam MP and enjoy the freedom to build how you want across more than 100 sqKM of land. Build PowerStations to run electric locomitives Build Storage for Coal,Diesel,Oil,water with more types on the way Game Features (some) 3 Worlds (1 Blank Testing World) 1435mm and 914mm track (standard + Narrow gauge) Track building Goods delivery (e.g Lumber,Containers,Rocks,Coal,Tanks? yes tanks,Industrial goods ect....) 6+ steam trains 9+ diesel trains 30+ trailer types 6 Cars + variants Recovery Cranes Drawbridges(various) Placeable Buildings(various) Buy Sell Vehicles Multiplayer Hoasting (Reliable and smooth multiplayer gameplay is very important to us) Dedicated Server/Headless server Day/Night cycle and weather Dynamic Steam engine Boilers check Out Our Youtube Playlist Join us on Discord
